ca.mcgill.ecse211.project
Class Odometer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Odometer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Odometer
extends java.lang.Thread

The odometer takes care of updating the values for X, Y and Theta based on the wheel motors tacho count.
